resume_text:
NAME: Emily Brown
EMAIL: emily.brown@email.com
PHONE: (555) 765-4321

SUMMARY:
Experienced Security Engineer with 8 years of experience in securing systems and networks. Expertise in vulnerability assessment and penetration testing.

SKILLS:
Python, AWS, Azure, Linux, Network Security, Penetration Testing, SIEM

EXPERIENCE:
CyberGuard Solutions - Senior Security Engineer (2018 - Present)
- Conducted vulnerability assessments and penetration tests on web applications and networks.
- Developed and implemented security policies and procedures.

Secure Systems Inc. - Security Engineer (2016 - 2018)
- Monitored security systems and responded to security incidents.
- Implemented security controls to protect sensitive data.

EDUCATION:
Carnegie Mellon University - Master's in Information Security (2016)

CERTIFICATIONS:
Certified Ethical Hacker
CompTIA Security+
